data.eml:eml: The aquatic Heteroptera (Insecta: Hemiptera) of the “ Foreste Casentinesi, Monte Falterona e Campigna ” National Park (Central Italy)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cianferoni, Fabio, Mazza, Giuseppe (2012): The aquatic Heteroptera (Insecta: Hemiptera) of the “ Foreste Casentinesi, Monte Falterona e Campigna ” National Park (Central Italy). Zootaxa 3568: 36-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282975
